titles.title: French Colonial Heritage National Historic Site Study Act of 2003

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the French Colonial Heritage Area in the State of Missouri as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
French Colonial Heritage National Historic Site Study Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: French Colonial Heritage National Historic Site Study Act of 2003 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the French Colonial Heritage Area within the Ste. Genevieve National Historic District, Missouri, as a unit of the National Park System.
